## Calculus materials: 

Khan Academy: 

* [integral calculus](https://www.khanacademy.org/math/integral-calculus) 
* [differential calculus](https://www.khanacademy.org/math/differential-calculus)

MIT: Units 1, 2, and 3 of the [Single Variable Calculus](https://ocw.mit.edu/courses/mathematics/18-01sc-single-variable-calculus-fall-2010/syllabus/) course 


Be familiar with the following concepts:
* How integration corresponds to areas under a curve
* The fundamental theorem of calculus
* A few basic derivation/integration rules: the power rule, the chain rule, * the derivatives of ln(x) and exp(x)
* How to maximize functions using first-order conditions
* Partial derivatives
* Double integrals for functions in the x-y plane
